net.sf.jclec.problem.util.dataset.attribute

Class NumericalAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.problem.util.dataset.attribute.AbstractAttribute
      • net.sf.jclec.problem.util.dataset.attribute.NumericalAttribute
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, net.sf.jclec.JCLEC, IAttribute

    public class NumericalAttribute
extends AbstractAttribute
    Numerical attribute. Defines the attribute value within a continuous real-valued interval.
    Author:
    Amelia Zafra, Sebastian Ventura
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
